definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :De 8:12 house (Ph. [[בת]], MI. [[בת]], sf. [[ביתה]], Ar.baytun, Aram. [[בַּיְתָא]], bayto0 As. bîtu, COT:Gloss, Sab. [[בית]], [[בת]], fortress DHM:ZMG 1883, 387; temple Hal:257 DHM:ZMG 1876, 697, Eth. bet: Palm. in [[בת עלמא]], [[בת מקברתא]] sepulchre Vog:32, 64 al.; etym. dub.; Thes √ [[בות]], Aram. [[בּוּת]], bot spend the night, Ar. ba0ta Eth. beta: but this perh. denom., & [[בית]] fr. √ [[ר]]“[[ל]] c. [[ת]] afform. cf. Sta:§187 a)—abs. [[בַּיִת]] Ex 12:30 +; [[בָָּיִת]] Ge 33:17 +; [[בַּ֫יְתָה]] ([[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc.) Ps 68:7 +; cstr. [[בֵּית]] Ge 12:15 +; sf. [[בֵּיתִי]] Ge 15:2 +; [[בֵּיתְךָ]] Ge 7:1 + , etc.; [[הַבַּ֫יְתָה]], [[בַּיְתָה]] (in) to the house, homeward, Ge 19:10, Ps 68:7 +; also [[בֵּ֫יתָה]] (in)to the house of …; pl. [[בָּֽתִּים]] Ex 1:21 + (i.e. bâttîm, v. Nö in Me:Arch. i. 456 f., cf. Ges:§ 96); cstr. [[בָּֽתֵּי]] Ex 8:17 +; sf. [[בָּתֶּיךָ]] Ex 10:6; [[בָּֽתָּיו]] 1Ch 28:11; [[בָּֽתֵּינוּ]] Ex 12:27 +; [[בָּֽתֵּיכֶם]] Ge 42:19; [[בָּתֵּיהֶם]] Nu 16:32 +; ([[בָּֽתֵּ֫ימוֹ]] Ps 49:12), etc.;—
house,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: as dwelling habitation Ge 19:2, Ge 19:3, Ge 19:4, Ge 19:11, Ge 27:15, Ge 33:17 (obj. of [[בָּנׇה]]) Ex 12:7 + oft.; [[מוֹשַׁב]] ´[[בּ]] Le 25:29 (cf. [[בַּיִת לְשִׁבְתִּי]] 2Sa 7:5); [[בֵּית]] = in the house of, when modifying word follows, cf. Dr:Sm 29, n. 2 (after st. cstr. [[מוֹלֶדֶת]] [[בַּיִת אוֹ מוֹלֶדֶת חוּץ]] Le 19:9); e.g. [[אָבִיךָ]] ´[[בּ]] Ge 24:23; [[אִישָׁהּ]] ´[[בּ]] Nu 30:11 [[יהוה]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ki 23:24; so in n.pr. [[ביתאל]] Am 7:13; [[בַּ֫יְתָה]]([[ה]]) into the house, home Ex 9:19 (of man & beast) cf., Ju Jdg 19:18, 1Sa 6:7 (cf. v:1Sa 6:10) 1Ki 13:7, 1Ki 13:15, Ps 68:7, Is 14:17 etc.; cf. sub

infr.; partic (a) in J occasionally of tent Ge 27:15 cf. Ge 33:17 (c. [[בנה]]; here of nomad's hut); usually (b ) house of solid materials, with doorposts, etc. Ex 12:7, De 6:9, De 11:20, walls Le 14:37, Le 14:39, of stones, timber & mortar v:Le 14:45 (cf. v:Le 14:40, v:Le 14:42, v:Le 14:43); so also Jos 2:15; supported by pillars Ju Jdg 16:26 f.; with roof on which one could walk 2Sa 11:12 etc.; v. esp. temple and king's house in Jerusalem 1Ki 5-7 etc.; cf. Ct So 1:7; Je 22:14; of Ezekiel's temple Ez 4o f.; [[בָּֽתֵּכֶם סְפוּנִים]] of luxurious houses Hag 1:4; [[בנה בָּֽתִּים טׂבִים]] De 8:12; [[בּנה]] [[בַּיִת־חָדָשׁ]] De 20:5 cf. De 22:8; also c. [[בנה]] De 28:30 + oft.; (g) cstr. before word of material, [[אֲרָזִים]] ´[[בּ]] 2Sa 7:2, 2Sa 7:7 = 1Ch 17:1 (´[[הַא]] ´[[בּ]]) v:1Ch 17:6; [[הַשֵּׁן]] ´[[בּ]] 1Ki 22:39 cf. Am 3:15; [[גׇּזִית]] ´[[בּ]] house of hewn stone Am 5:11; cf. [[בֵּית יַעַר הַלְּבָנוֹן]] 1Ki 7:2, 2Ch 9:20, [[בֵּית הַיַּעַר]] Is 22:8; (d) also before word of quality or characteristic, [[בֵּית אֵבֶל]] Ec 7:2 ‖[[מִשְׁתֶּה]] ´[[בּ]] v:Ec 7:4 ‖[[שִׂמְחָה]] ´[[בּ]]; [[מַרְזֵחַ]] ´[[בּ]] Je 16:5; [[מִשְׁתֶּה]] ´[[בּ]] Je 16:8; [[בָּֽתֵּי חֶמְדָּתֵךְ]] Ez Eze 26:12; [[בֵּית תַּעֲנֻגֶי֑הָ]] Mic 2:9; cf. [[מְרִי]] ´[[בּ]] rebellious house sub

definitions.title: 5. d
definitions.body: infr.; (e) in combinations, of structures for various purposes:—(1) [[בֵּית הַמֶּלֶךְ]] = palace 1Ki 9:1, 1Ki 9:10, 1Ki 10:12 +, etc.; [[בֵּית מַמְלָכָה]] Am 7:13 cf. sub

infr.; [[הַמַּלְכוּת]] ´[[בּ]] Es 5:1 cf. Es 2:16; [[לְמַלְכוּתוֹ]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ch 1:18; (2) [[בֵּית הַסּׂהַר]] = the prison Ge 39:20, Ge 39:20, Ge 39:21, Ge 39:22, Ge 39:39; Ge 39:22, Ge 39:23, Ge 40:3, Ge 40:5; cf. [[מִשְׁמַרְכֶם]] ´[[בּ]] Ge 42:19; [[מִשְׁמֶרֶת]] ´[[בּ]] 2Sa 20:3; ´[[בּ]] [[הָאָסוּר]] Je 37:15; [[הָאֲסיּרים]] ´[[בּ]] Ju Jdg 16:21; Jdg 16:25; [[הָסַוּרִים]] ´[[בּ]] Ec 4:14; [[הַכֶּלֶא]] ´[[בּ]] 1Ki 22:27, 2Ki 17:4, 2Ch 18:26, Je 37:15, Je 37:18 cf. Is 42:7; [[כֶּלֶא]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ki 25:27; [[הַמַּהְפֶּכֶת]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ch 16:10; [[הַכְּליּ֠א]] ´[[בּ]] Je 37:4 Je 52:31; [[בָּֽתֵּי כְלָאִים]] Is 42:22; [[בֵּית־הַבּוֹר]] Je 37:16; [[הַפְּקֻדּוֹת]] ´[[בּ]] Je 52:31; (3) [[בֵּית]] [[הַנׇּשִׁים]] house of the women, harem Es 2:9, Es 2:11, Es 2:13, Es 2:14; (4) [[מִשְׁתֵּה הַיַּיִן]] ´[[בּ]] Es 7:8; [[הַיׇּ֑יִן]] ´[[בּ]] Ct So 2:4; cf. [[בָּֽתֵּי]] [[מָשׂוֹשׂ]] Is 32:13; (5) [[בֵּית הַחׂרֶף]] Am 3:15, Je 36:22; ´[[הַקָָּיִץ בּ]] Am 3:15; (6) [[בֵּית נְכׂתׂה]] & [[בֵּית כֵּלָיו]] 2Ki 20:13 = Is 39:2; (7) [[בֵּית הַגׇּן]] garden-h. (or n. pr.? cf. p. III) 2Ki 9:27; (8) [[בֵּית־עֵקֶד]] binding-h. (or n. pr. ?) 2Ki 10:12, 2Ki 10:14; (9) [[בֵּיתעֲבָדִים]] h. of slaves (where slaves live), only fig. of Egypt Ex 13:3, Ex 13:14, Ex 20:2, De 5:6, De 6:12, De 7:8, De 8:14, De 13:6, De 13:11, Jos 24:17, Ju Jdg 6:8, Mic 6:4, Je 34:13; —on [[הַחָפְשִׁית]] ´[[בּ]] 2Ki 15:5 = 2Ch 26:21 cf. [[חפשׁית]]; esp. (10) ´[[בֵּית י]] = temple 1Ki 7:12, 1Ki 7:40, 1Ki 7:45, 1Ki 7:51 & very oft.; also (mostly late) [[בֵּית הָאֱלֽהִים]] 1Ch 9:11, 1Ch 9:13, 1Ch 9:26 + oft.; but also of earlier tent of worship Ju Jdg 18:31; v. also [[הָאׂהֶל]] ´[[בּ]] 1Ch 9:23, cf. [[אֱלֽהִים]] ´[[בּ]] of local shrine 1Ch 17:5; & also in mouth of Jacob, as explanation of name of Bethel Ge 28:17 (cf. v:Ge 28:19), & as name of stone, or Maççeba v:Ge 28:22 = (all E); also ´[[י]] ´[[ב]] of earlier tent of worship Ju Jdg 19:18, 1Sa 1:7, 1Sa 1:24, 2Sa 12:20 (cf. further [[אֱלֽהִים]], [[יהוה]]); [[הָאוֹחָד]] ´[[בּ]] Mal 3:10; cf. [[הֵיכַל הַבַּיִת]] 1Ki 6:3, & ´[[בּ]] alone in same sense, esp. 1Ki 6 cf. 2Ch 1:18, 2Ch 2:3, 2Ch 2:11 +; v. 1Ch 28:2 ´[[מְנוּחָה לַאֲרוֹן בְּרִית־י]] ´[[בּ]] [[וְלַהֲדׂם רַגְלֵי אֱלֽהֵינוּ]]; also [[בֵּית הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] 1Ch 29:3; [[קׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[בּ]] [[הַקֳּדָשִׁים]] 2Ch 3:8, 2Ch 3:10 [[קָדְשֵׁנוּ וְתִפְאַרְתֵּנוּ]] ´[[בּ]] Is 64:10; [[בֵּית־זְבֻל]] 2Ch 6:2; [[בֵּית זׇ֑בַח]] 2Ch 7:12 [[בֵּית מִקְדָּשָׁם]] 2Ch 36:17; [[תְּפִלָּה]] ´[[בּ]] Is 56:7, Is 56:7; [[תִּפְאַרְתִּי]] ´[[בּ]] Is 60:7; also of heathen temples [[בַּעַל־בְּרִית]] ´[[ב]] Ju Jdg 9:4; [[־דָּגוֹן]]´[[ב]] 1Sa 5:5 [[עַשְׁתָּרוֹת]] ´[[ב]] 1Sa 31:10; [[רִמּוֹן]] ´[[ב]] 2Ki 5:18, 2Ki 5:18, 2Ki 5:18; [[הַבַּעַל]] ´[[ב]] 2Ki 10:21, 2Ki 10:21, 2Ki 10:23, 2Ki 10:25, 2Ki 10:26, 2Ki 10:27, 1Ki 11:18; [[עֲחַבֵּיהֶם]] ´[[בּ]] 1Sa 31:9 (but rd. rather [[את־עחביהם]] as in ‖ 1Ch 10:9 so LXX We Dr); [[בֵּית בָּמוֹת]] 1Ki 12:31 (cf. MI [[בת במת]]) v. also 1Ki 13:32, 2Ki 17:29, 2Ki 17:32; [[בֵּית אוֹחַר אֱלֽהָיו]] Da 1:2 etc.; made of woven material 2Ki 23:7; [[אֲשֶׁר הַנׇּשִׁים אׂרְגוֹת]] [[שָׁם בָּֽתִּים לָאֲשֵׁרָה]] perh. = tent-shrines but txt. dub. LXX xettiei=n ([[כתנות]] ?); LXXL stola/v; cf. Ew:H iii.718 & Klo; (z) of portion of larger building (late), so pl. [[בָּֽתָּיו]] 1Ch 28:11 i.e. of the temple (‖[[גַּנְזַכָּיו]], [[עֲלִיּׂתָיו]], [[חֲדָרָיו]]); cf. [[הַכַּפּׂרֶת]] ´[[בּ]] ib.; [[הַמְַבַשְּׁלִים]] ´[[בּ]] Ez Eze 46:24.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as shelter or abode of animals 1Sa 6:7, 1Sa 6:10 cf. Ex 9:19; [[בֵּית עַכָּבִישׁ]] Job 8:14 spider's web (cf. [[בָּנׇה]] [[כָעָשׁ בֵּיתוֹ]] Job 27:18); of wild ass Job 39:6 [[שַׂמְתִּי עֲרָבָה]] [[בֵיתוֹ]]; [[חִפּוֹר מָֽחְאָה בַּיִת]] Ps 84:4 (‖[[קֵן]]); [[חֲסִידָה בְּרוֹשִׁים]] [[בֵּיתָהּ]] Ps 104:17 (cf. ‖ & Che); Pr 30:26 (of the [[שְׁפַנִּים]] ‘ conies ’).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: fig. of human bodies [[בָּֽתֵּי־חׂמֶר]] Job 4:19 houses of clay, cf. in phr. [[שׁׂמְרֵי הַבַּיִת]] Ec 12:3  keepers of the house, i.e. the arms; v. further [[בֵּית מְגוּרָָי]] Ps 119:54.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of abode of light & darkness Job 38:20.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of land of Ephraim as [[יהוה]] ´[[בּ]] Ho 8:1, Ho 9:15 (cf. ´[[אֶרֶץ י]] Ho 9:3).

place, of Jerusalem [[בֵּית קִבְרוֹת אֲבׂתַי]] Ne 2:3 (‖[[עִיר]] v:Ne 2:5), cf. also n.pr. cpd. with [[בֵּית]], infr., & [[בֵּית מַמְלָכָה]] Am 7:13 (pred. of Bethel); [[בֵּית נְתִיבוֹת]] Pr 8:2 i.e. where paths meet RV; [[אֲבָנִים]] ´[[בּ]] Job 8:17; on both these v. [[בֵּית]] sub [[[בַּיִן]]] [[בֵּין]] p. 108. †

receptacle, [[תְּעָלָה כְּבֵית סָאתַיִם]] 1Ki 18:32 a trench like a receptacle of two seahs; [[בָּֽתֵּי נֶפֶשׁ]] Is 3:20 i.e. vials of perfume; esp. [[בָּֽתִּים לְבַדִּים]] Ex 25:27 holders for the staves, i.e. rings, [[טַבָּעׂת]] ib.; so Ex 37:14, Ex 37:27, Ex 38:5; cf. [[בָּֽתִּים לַבְּרִיחִם]] Ex 26:29, Ex 36:34 holders for the bars (all P, & all expl. by [[טבעת]]); [[בֵּית־לָהּ סָבִיב]] Ez Eze 1:27 (si vera l.) its [cstr. as Ps 58:5] house (= enclosing cage) was round about (del. BHiCo).

of house as containing a family, hence in phr. of slaves belonging to household [[יְלִידֵי בֵיתוֹ]] Ge 14:14 cf. Ge 17:12 (opp. [[מִקְנַת־כֶּסֶף]]) v:Ge 17:13 (all ‖ id.) fig. of Israel Je 2:14 (‖[[עֶבֶד]]); cf. [[בֶּן־בֵּיתִי]] Ge 15:3; [[בְּנֵי־בַיִת הָיׇה לִי]] Ec 2:7 (as token of wealth & prosperity); also of one's sister [[מוֹלֶדֶת בַּיִת]] Le 18:19 (‖[[חוּץ]] ´[[מ]] cf. infr.); [[אַנְשֵׁי בֵיתוֹ]] Ge 17:27; ´[[נַפְשׁוֹת בּ]] Ge 36:6; [[כָּל־הַנֶּפֶשׁ]] [[לְבֵית־יַעֲקׂב]] Ge 46:27. Hence
household, family (592 t.)

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ordinary sense, those belonging to the same household Ge 7:1, Ge 12:1, Ge 12:17 +, De 6:22, De 11:6 +; Hex mostly JD; E Ge 35:2, Ge 42:33, Ge 50:22 cf. Ex 1:21 infr.; P Ge 36:6, Ex 1:1, Ex 12:4, Le 16:6, Le 16:11, Le 16:17, Nu 16:32, Nu 18:31, Jos 22:15; even where expressly said to inhabit tents Nu 16:32, De 11:6 [[אֶת־בָּֽתֵּיהֶם וְאֶת־אָהֳלֵיהֶם]]; specif. ´[[זְקַן־בּ]] Ge 24:2 cf. Ge 50:7 (of rank & dignity in household); of a family of handicraftsmen [[מִשְׁפְּחוֹת בֵּית־עֲבׂדַת הַבֻּץ]] 1Ch 4:21 (v. [[בוץ]]); also, with fig. of house clearly in mind ´[[מִשְׁקׂלֶת בּ]] 2Ki 21:13; ´[[מַפְתֵּחַ בּ]] Is 22:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: family of descendants, descendants as organized body Ge 18:19 (J ‖[[בָּנִים]]) +, & so c. [[בָּנׇה]] (q.v.) [[אחיו]] ´[[יִבְנֶה בּ]] De 25:9 cf. Ru 4:11 &, subj. ´[[י]], [[לְ]] ´[[בָּנׇה בּ]] 2Sa 7:27 = 1Ch 17:10, 1Ch 17:25; also 1Sa 2:35, 1Ki 11:38 (both [[נֶאֱמָן]] ´[[בּ]]), so [[לְ]] ´[[עשׂה בּ]] 2Sa 7:11, 1Ki 2:24; also pl. [[וַיַּעַשׂ לָהֶם בָּֽתִּים]] Ex 1:21; [[נֶאֱמָן לְ]] ´[[עשׂה ב]] 1Sa 25:28; cf. esp. c. n.pr., eg.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: esp. of Hebrew people & subdivisions: (a) † [[בֵּית יִשְׂחָָק]] Am 7:16; (b) † [[עֵשָׂו]] ´[[בּ]] Ob:Ob 18, Ob:Ob 18; (g) † [[בֵּית]] [[יַעֲקׂב]] Ge 46:27 (P) Ex 19:3 (E) Am 3:13, Am 9:8, Mic 2:7, Mic 3:9, Ob:Ob 17, Ob:Ob 18, Is 8:17, Is 10:20, Is 14:1, Is 29:22, Is 46:3, Is 48:1, Is 58:1, Je 2:4, Je 5:20, Ps 114:1; also [[יעקב]] ´[[זֶרַע בּ]] Ez Eze 20:5 (del. Co); most frequently (d) [[בֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל]] (Vrss & var. sometimes [[בני]] v. [[בֵּן]]) †Hex Ex 16:31, Ex 40:38, Le 10:6, Nu 20:29 (all P) Le 17:3, Le 17:8, Le 17:10, Le 22:18 (H) Jos 21:43 (D) †; 1Sa 7:2 + 8 t. S K; Ho 1:4, Ho 1:6, Ho 5:1, Ho 6:10, Ho 12:1; Am 5:1 + 7 t. Am; † Mic 1:5, Mic 3:1, Mic 3:9, Is 5:7, Is 14:2, also Is 46:3, Is 63:7, Zec 8:13 †; but esp. Je 2:4, Je 2:26 + 17 t. Je; Ez Eze 3:1, Eze 3:4, Eze 3:5, Eze 3:7, Eze 3:7, Eze 3:17 + 75 t. Ez; also [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] ´[[זֶרַע בּ]] Je 23:8, Ez Eze 44:22 (Co del. ´[[בּ]]); † [[שְׁנֵי בָֽתֵּי]] [[יִשְׂרָאֵל]] Is 8:14; [[בֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל וִיהוּדָה]] Ez Eze 9:9 + Eze 25:8 Co; futher [[בֵּית מְרִי]] rebellious house (of Isr.) Ez Eze 2:5, Eze 2:6, Eze 3:9, Eze 3:26, Eze 3:27, Eze 12:2, Eze 12:3, & [[הַמֶָּרִי]] ´[[בּ]] Ez Eze 2:8, Eze 12:2, Eze 12:9, Eze 12:25, Eze 17:12, Eze 24:3 [+ Eze 44:6 Co]; (e) [[בֵּית יְהוּדָה]] 2Sa 2:4, 2Sa 2:7, 2Sa 2:10, 2Sa 2:11, 1Ki 12:21 = 2Ch 11:1, 2Ki 19:30 = Is 37:31, Is 22:21, Ho 1:7, Ho 5:12, Ho 5:14, Zep 2:7, Zec 8:13, Zec 8:15, Zec 8:19, Zec 10:3, Zec 10:6, Zec 12:4, & esp. Je 3:18 + 9 t. Je; Ez Eze 4:6 + 4 t. Ez + Eze 9:9 supr.; also † [[יְהוּדָה וּבִנְיׇמִן]] ´[[בּ]] 1Ki 12:23; † [[מֶלֶךְ יְהוּדָה]] ´[[בּ]] Je 21:11, Je 22:6; (z) † [[יוֹסֵף]] ´[[בּ]] Ge 50:8, Jos 17:17, Jos 18:5 (all JE) Ju Jdg 1:22, Jdg 1:23, Jdg 1:35, 2Sa 19:21, 1Ki 11:28, Am 5:6, Ob:Ob 18, Zec 10:6; (h) † [[אֶפְרַיִם]] ´[[בּ]] Ju Jdg 10:9; (q) [[בִּנְיׇמִן]] ´[[בּ]] 2Sa 3:19 cf. 1Ki 12:23 supr.; (i) † [[יִשָּׂשכָר]] ´[[בּ]] 1Ki 15:27; (k) † [[לֵוִי]] ´[[בּ]] Ex 2:1 (E) Nu 17:23 (P) Zec 12:13 (´[[ל]] ´[[משׁפחת ב]]), Ps 135:20; & (l) [[אַהֲרׂן]] ´[[בּ]] Ps 115:10, Ps 115:12, Ps 118:3, Ps 135:19.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: technically, yet with some looseness of usage, [[בֵּית אָב]] father's house, of family or clan, pl. [[בֵּית אָבוֹת]] father-houses, families (e.g. Nu 1:2) (79 t.; only P & Chr) Ex 6:14, Ex 12:3, Nu 1:2, Nu 1:4, Nu 1:18 + 41 t. Nu; Jos 22:14, Jos 22:14, 1Ch 4:38, 1Ch 5:13 + 25 t. Ch; Ezr 2:59, Ezr 10:16, Ne 7:61, Ne 10:35; = tribe Nu 17:17, Nu 17:17, Nu 17:3, Nu 17:6; = main division of tribe Nu 3:20, Nu 3:24 +, cf. Nu 34:14, Nu 34:14 etc.; futher sub-division Ex 12:3, 1Ch 7:2, 1Ch 7:7 +; cf. esp. 1Ch 23:11 Jeush and Beriah had not many sons, therefore they became [[לְבֵית אָב לִפְקֻדָּה אֶחָָת]] (cf. [[ראשׁי אבות]], sub [[אב]]).

house, including household affairs, persons, property, etc. [[וַיַּפְקִדֵהוּ עַל־בֵּיתוֹ]] Ge 39:4 cf. [[בְּבֵיתוֹ]] v:Ge 39:5; [[אֲשֶׁר עַל־בֵּיתוֹ]] Ge 44:1, Ge 44:4; hence [[אשׁר]] [[על הבית]] as title of governor of the palace (Ew:H iii. 269) Is 22:15, Is 36:3 cf. 1Ki 4:6, 2Ki 15:5; in Israel 1Ki 16:9, 1Ki 18:3, 2Ki 10:5: further 2Sa 17:23, 2Ki 20:1 = Is 38:1; hence of personal property 1Ki 13:8 [[אִם־תִּתֶּן־לִי אֶת־חֲחִי בֵּיתֶָךָ]]; family and property (everything on which one depends) Job 8:15.

[[בַּ֫יְתָה]], [[בָָּיְתָה]], lit. housewards, hence metaph. inwards, † Ex 28:26 = Ex 39:19 (sc. of the ephod), 1Ki 7:25 = 2Ch 4:4 (sc. of the circle of oxen supporting the molten sea); 2Sa 5:9 [[מִן־הַמִּלּוֹא וׇבָָיְתָה]] from the Millo and inward, Ez Eze 44:17.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: adv. on the inside (of a building, chest, etc.: opp. [[מִחוּץ]]) † Ge 6:14, Ex 25:11 = Ex 37:2, Le 14:41, 1Ki 6:15, 1Ki 6:16, 1Ki 7:9, 2Ki 6:30 (of a person's clothes), Ez Eze 7:15; so with [[ה]] loc. [[מִבַּ֫יְתָה]] † 1Ki 6:15

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: † [[מִבֵּית לְ]] (cstr. Ges:§ 130, 1 n.) prep. within (opp. [[מִחוּץ לְ]]), [[מִבֵּית לַפָּרׂכֶת]] within the veil Ex 26:33, Le 16:2, Le 16:12, Nu 18:7 [[לְכָל־דְּבַר הַמִּזִבֵּחַ וּלְמִבֵּית]] [[לַפָּרׂכֶת]] for everything of the altar, and for (that) within the veil; 1Ki 7:8, 1Ki 7:31; (rd. [[לַכְּתֵפׂת]]; see VB & Sta:ZAW 1883, 165); [[אֶל־מִבֵּית לְ]] (after a verb of motion) in within Le 16:15, 2Ki 11:15 = 2Ch 23:14.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: Note.—[[בית]] perh. occurs abbrev. into [[בּ]] in n.pr. [[בְּעֶשְׁתְּרָה]] q.v. so Thes al.; cf. also Aram. [[בא]] = [[בית]] in like usage Lag:Armen. Stud. § 339; Se i. 51; GGA 1884, 276.
